page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AND LEISURE
page.content: In the Collingham area about 70 %of the adult population work full time or part time.Nearly 20% of the people were retired whilst 10 % were unemployed. This figure is slightly below the national figure for 1985. In their spare time 30% of the people watched T.V regulary.This figure seems to be rather low and was based on a small sample.Sport was an important leisure pursuit with half the population participating in their spare time. The village attracted people as residents because it has a pleasent environment surrounded by countryside.The most consistent dislike in the village was the busy A58.It is a not particulary religious village as only 30% attend church. The small sample were unanimous in liking the village.
